episodes.title: Exposing the Truth: IHOPKC Scandal, Spiritual Abuse, and the Path to Healing Pt 1
episodes.description:
In this episode, we react to and analyze the recent bombshell podcast from Dwayne and Jennifer Roberts about the IHOPKC scandal. Join us as we break down:

The background of shocking allegations about Mike Bickle and IHOP's leadership
Dwayne and Jennifer's personal experiences and their journey to speaking out
The biblical basis for exposing misconduct in church leadership
The concept of the "Cone of Silence" in religious organizations
The complex process of healing from spiritual betrayal

We examine the broader implications for church culture, the charismatic movement, and how we approach prophecy and leadership in Christian communities. Our discussion includes:

Analyzing IHOP's teachings and culture
The debate over whether IHOP can be considered a cult
The importance of critical thinking in faith communities
Balancing accountability with compassion in addressing church scandals
The lack of shepherding after the atombomb was lobbed at Mike and why they've waited so long to try after so many have left the faith 

Whether you're a former IHOP member, a current church leader, or someone interested in religious studies, this episode offers valuable insights into one of the most significant scandals in recent Christian history.
Like, subscribe, and share your thoughts in the comments. Let's engage in this crucial conversation about transparency, accountability, and healing in the church.
#IHOPKC #Mikebickle #ChurchAccountability #SpiritualAbuse
subjects: International House of Prayer Kansas City

episodes.title: Augustine Alcala -  Originator of the Black Horse Prophecy and One who Sent Mike From STL to KC
episodes.description:
We've seen much of Bob Jones and Paul Cain, but less of Augustine yet many of us built our lives and childrens lives on his words.  

From Mike;
In June 1982, I was called to leave St. Louis to go to Kansas City. Augustine Alcala, a man with
a proven prophetic ministry, heard the audible voice of God about me while visiting St. Louis.
In October 1982, Augustine gave me four words about the new work in Kansas City.
1. Thousands of young people will gather in Kansas City.
2. The full manifestation of the gifts of the Holy Spirit will operate.
3. A false prophet will arise in your midst in the early days (he was discovered).
4. Controversies and accusations will arise against you; do not answer them, but trust the Lord.
subjects: International House of Prayer Kansas City

episodes.title: Deconstructing Mike Bickle Part 2 NAR or Not? Apostle? Prophet?
episodes.description:
Mike deviated from the NAR and Branham and Cain, but watchdogs didn't read his teachings enough to know that. He had 17 years to devise something entirely different, a variation of Historic Premillennialism retitled; Apostolic Premillennialism. This allowed the youth to justify living radically and abandoning all to applying every bible verse as extremely as possible and giving all to Mike's movement, he taught Scripture the same way the early church fathers did.  They believed they'd see the AntiChrist in their lifetime and so did Mike and his followers. 

#ihopkc #mikebickle #forerunnerchurch #tdjakes #ravizacharias #bethel #cult #nlp #branham #nar #narcissisticabusesurvivor #cultsurvivor
